code: import*as types from'../constants/actionType';var initialState={name:'',status:-1};var myReducer=function myReducer(){var filter=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case types.FILTER_TABLE:return{name:action.filter.name,status:action.filter.status};default:return filter;}};export default myReducer;
